articles.Title: IBM Acquires AlchemyAPI, Enhancing Watson's Deep Learning Capabilities
articles.Description: The acquisition will accelerate IBM's development of next generation cognitive computing applications. IBM will integrate AlchemyAPI's deep learning technology into the core Watson platform, augmenting Watson's ability to quickly identify hierarchies and understand relationships within large volume data sets.
